original_text: Fight the good fight of the faith. Take hold of the eternal life to which you were called and about which you made the good confession in the presence of many witnesses.
korean_text: 믿음의 선한 싸움을 싸우라 영생을 취하라 이를 위하여 네가 부르심을 받았고 많은 증인 앞에서 선한 증언을 하였도다

sentences.original_text: Fight the good fight of the faith.
Take hold of the eternal life
and about which you made the good confession
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 좋은 고백을 한 그것에 대해

sentences.original_text: in the presence of many witnesses.
